title: Album Stream: Nurses – Dracula
body: The follow up to 2009’s **_Apple’s Acre_** is set to release through **[Dead Oceans](http://www.scdistribution.com/cat/scd_catalog.php?usersearch=Nurses&pagerequest=)** on September 20 in the form of a new LP entitled **_Dracula_**. The psychedelic 3-piece now have a remarkably more accomplished sound, with the group entering into a purpose build studio for the new record. The beats seem more layered with the tracks ultimately sounding remarkably more polished. Stream the new **[Nurses](http://www.facebook.com/pages/nurses/207544348528)** album **[here](http://yourstru.ly/2011/09/13/nurses-dracula-album-stream/)** and be sure to **[BUY](http://www.scdistribution.com/cat/scd_catalog.php?usersearch=Nurses&pagerequest=)** it later this month.
